留言內容: I’m 5’7 and weigh 220. My bra size is 40D.  Most tops are too short for my long torso and, frankly they show that bit of belly that I’d like to get rid of.  I took a chance on this because I liked the pattern. I bought the 2XL, which is what I’m wearing now for most tops. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the material was silky, but didn’t cling or show through.  The front of the blouse came down far enough to cover, and the cut of the back was even longer to cover the rear or tuck in.  The buttons were easy enough to manage and the sleves allowed me to push them up similar to the model.  Im very happy with this purchase.

留言內容: I like that this shirt has a nice, loose but flattering fit. The fabric feels light but is not flimsy/see through. I got the yellow which is a pretty mustard yellow but not flattering for my coloring unfortunately. I also don't like that it's printed on one side so when your collar is open you can see the unprinted side. Makes it look cheap.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I wear blouses to work most days, so I thought this Dokotoo Women's Casual V Neck Alicia Floral Print Roll Up Long Sleeve Chiffon Button Down Blouse would be a nice addition to my wardrobe.  The blouse is on the looser, blousier side which I prefer.  It fits nicely and the material is silky soft.  It has a seam across the back just below my shoulders which gives the back a little detail.  I think it is flattering.  The only negative is I got the white blouse, which I like, but it does have somewhat of a Dalmatian look.  The white is not see through at all.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫

留言內容: The wife likes it and says that it is cute, though, as others have mentioned, the cut is a little boxy at the bottom and looks better tucked in. The seams are well done and it washes well, no color bleed on the first wash. The material is light and flowing, which makes it a great wear for the warmer months.

If you want the look in the seller image you have to order up a size. Your size will not fit like the image unless you do.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫

留言內容: In the photo this seemed like a more casual-looking top to me. When I tried it on, it seemed definitely like more of an office-type top to me, in the way that it was cut and the material. I am retired so I no longer have a need or desire for office-type clothing. I am 5’4” and weigh 125, and the top was quite large on me. I tried to “dress down” the top, to make it work for more casual settings, but I was not successful. I have not actually worn the shirt for any length of time, so I cannot speak to how comfortable it is, or how it holds up to laundering. I will be finding someone who can make better use of this shirt.

留言內容: This is a very soft and comfortable long-sleeve. It will look good on you and it certainly will have people looking at you. It's the right amount of sheer, and visual V-neck.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I recently added the Women’s Casual V Neck Alicia Floral Print Blouse to my work wardrobe and have mixed feelings about it. The blouse fits beautifully and the fabric feels substantial, which I appreciate for a work setting.However, I’ve encountered a minor but notable issue with the buttons. They tend to snag on some loose threads around the buttonholes, which can be quite bothersome during a busy day. This snagging raises some concerns about the blouse’s durability, particularly how it will fare after regular washing.The blouse’s print is another area where expectations differ slightly from reality. Described as floral, it resembles more of tiny buds or berries rather than full flowers. I chose the black on white pattern, which initially gave off a Dalmatian-like vibe, though it’s not an exact match for that either.Overall, I’m giving this blouse 3 stars. While the fit and style are great for professional attire, the button snagging issue and concerns about its longevity are drawbacks. It’s a charming piece, but whether it stands the test of time remains to be seen.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: I love black and white. This top is fashionable without being annoying. Matches everything and great for work attire or going out. Sizing is accurate and I like the thinner blouse material because our layers in office make it too warm.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白色
留言內容: This is a great, everyday blouse that works equally well with jeans, denim shorts, or a black pencil skirt or trousers.  The blouse cut and print is exactly as it appears in the listing images - very cute!  Fabric is lightweight, silky, and comfortable. The sizing is as expected - I am 5’8, 135, 36C/D, and I decided to size up to the large as I was worried about buttons gaping at the bustline.  I discovered that I definitely could have gone with the medium, BUT I actually like the larger fit as the extra fabric allows the blouse to drape a bit more, giving it the looser, relaxed look in the listing pics.  I would advise you to size up if you are large-busted to avoid the dreaded gaping potential, but if you are on the smaller/average busted side, you can probably just go with your typical size.

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 灰色
留言內容: I really like this blouse!  I weigh about 160 pounds, and got the size Large.  It was the right choice!  It fits comfortably across the bust, no button gaps.  The arm length is appropriate for this style of blouse.  There is a cool seam detailing on the back that adds a really nice touch.  I do like to tuck the front of blouses like this, but the one looks nice either way.  It is a looser flowy style, which goes well with the fabric.  The material is soft, does not fade in washing, and it also does not wrinkle.  This blouse is on the dressier side because of the fabric, but it would look great with jeans, dress pants, or a skirt. Overall, this is a really nice addition to my closet, great price, and great style!

商品名稱: Dokotoo 女款 休閒 V 領 Alicia 花卉印花 捲起來 長袖 雪紡 鈕扣襯衫 波西米亞上衣 襯衫

留言內容: The fabric is soft and silky, and the red at least is bright. I wear a small, and this is slightly larger, but not enough for me to care. I recommend this for its comfort and good looks.
